about.paragraph1: Hello! My name is Eduardo Fuentes, a passionate software developer with solid experience in Back-End development technologies.
about.paragraph2: My focus is on efficiency and best practices. I believe in the importance of clean and well-documented code, and I always look for ways to improve the architecture and performance of applications.
about.paragraph3: In my free time, I explore new tools and frameworks. Outside of technology, I enjoy spending time in nature and building healthy habits. If you're interested in collaborating or just want to talk about technology, don't hesitate to contact me. I'm always open to new opportunities and challenges.
about.paragraph4: Additionally, in my free time, I create content about technology.
